A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While I didn't find this installment to be the worst star wars movie ever made\, I also didn't find it to be the best either. It was sort of meh for me. I like how Disney isn't just copy and pasting like it's been doing the past 2 years and they're expanding their horizons though. I don't want to spoil anything\, but some parts seem badly scripted\, slow\, and boring whilst other parts were pretty entertaining. I would rate this as about similar in entertainment value to Attack of the Clones.
